###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlStatusBar_GetUnicodeFormat

###Description###
Retrieves the Unicode character format flag

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiStatusBar.au3>
_GUICtrlStatusBar_GetUnicodeFormat($hWnd)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to the control
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
True: Control is using Unicode characters
False: Control is using ANSI characters

###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
_GUICtrlStatusBar_SetUnicodeFormat
